addNetworks.title: Ɓeydu Rajooji e Wallet
addNetworks.description: Dobo rajo fof ngam ɓeydude ɗum e MetaMask, Rabby, walla Web3 wallets goɗɗi

addNetwork.alreadyPending: Ɗaɓɓo ina jokkii. Ƴeew wallet maa.
addNetwork.error: Ɓeydude rajo waɗaani. Tiiɗno ɓeydu ɗum e junngo.

networkWarning.title: Rajo Bonɗo
networkWarning.message: Waylude token ko dow BSC Chain tan waɗata. Tiiɗno waylu fayde BSC ngam waylude legacy tokens maa.

bridge.historyStoredLocally: Daartol kuuɗe ina reenaa e ngal kuutorgal

settings.title: Teelte
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Hesɗitina RPC URL huutoraaɗo ngam kala chain nder nokkuure suɓaaɗe.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Alaa chainji toɓɓaaɗi ngam nokkuure ndee.

banner.title: Aɗa hesɗii ɗoo?
banner.message: Janno ko Freedom Bridge, e no mbaɗaa pontu TigerOG tokenji hakkunde chains.
banner.note: Tesko: Waylude token ko duumiiɗo, waawaa artireede.

hero.title: Yoofu <1/> <2>Galu</2> Maa
hero.subtitle: Pontu TigerOG tokenji hakkunde chains huutoraade Axelar Interchain Token Service. Ina reeni, ina yaawi, alaa tax.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge ina huutoroo Axelar ITS ngam addude pontu experience mo alaa caɗeele, mo reeni, mo alaa tax, hakkunde {{count}}+ blockchains.

stopDecay.title: Dartinde Bonannde
stopDecay.description: Legacy tokens ina duppa 10-11% e soodorɗi maa e kala coodgu e yeeygu. Waylude e TigerOG ina dartina ɗum ɗoon e ɗoon, ina reena 100% e soodorɗi maa.

conversion.title: 1:1 Waylude
conversion.description: Limoore fof waylataako. Tokenji ina jogaa nder conversion contract mo reeni, te 1:1 potɗo ina waɗaa. Alaa inflation, alaa dilution.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain
multichain.description: Deploy laawol gootol, heɓ kala nokku. Galu maa ina wonta native interchain token dow chains hono Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, e ko nanndi heen.

security.title: Axelar Security
security.description: Axelar's decentralized network of validators wallitoo. ITS ina laaɓa wonde tokenji maa ina transfer-ee no haanirta e kala rajooji jokkondirɗi.

cta.title: A hebijii ngam pontude?
cta.description: Naatu e interchain revolution. Ina ƴetta les minti ngam waylude tokenji maa te fuɗɗaade pontude via Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Heɓu Galu
buyTokens.description: Alaa tokenji taho? Soodo base tokens dow PancakeSwap, caggal ɗum waylu ɗi fayde versions kese multichain.

header.title: Binndanɗe
header.subtitle: Janno no waylirtaa legacy tokens te pontirtaa hakkunde chains.

whatIs.title: Ko woni Freedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge ko decentralized pontu protocol feewnaaɗo dow Axelar's Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ina newna maa waylude legacy tokens fayde galu alaa tax mo waawi dillude hakkunde blockchains tawaaɗi.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Legacy tokens ina keewi 10%+ taxes. TigerOG tokens ko 0% tax.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Dillin galu hakkunde {{count}}+ blockchains via Axelar.

howToConvert.title: No Waylirtaa Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Jokku wallet maa e source chain (mis. BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Suɓo legacy token mo njiɗɗaa waylude.
howToConvert.step4: Yamir Conversion contract ngam huutoraade tokenji maa.
howToConvert.step5: Dobo Waylu ngam nelde legacy tokens maa te heɓaa limoore potɗe e "TigerOG" tokens.
howToConvert.note: Tesko: Waylude ina adda legacy token's transaction tax (nder upgrade) so token maa ina ƴetta tax e transfers. Kono, so waylaaɗa fayde TigerOG, kala transfers e ponts garooji alaa ɗum tax.

supportedNetworks.title: Rajooji Tawaaɗi
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge ina wallita ecosystem mawɗo {{count}}+ blockchains, ina newna interoperability hakkunde EVM landscape via Axelar.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ina newna tokens deploy-eede dow chains keewɗi e address gooto e unified supply management. Freedom Bridge ina huutoroo ITS ngam laaɓa wonde TigerOG ina heddii canonical asset kala ɗo pontaa.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Min kuutortoo Axelar ngam interoperability layer amen. Axelar ko decentralized network mo newnata blockchains ceertuɗi jokkondirde, ina newna secure cross-chain communication e galu transfers. Axelar's security model ina pawaa e permissionless set of validators, ina rokka high-grade security ngam interchain tokens.

conversion.title: Conversion Logic
conversion.content: Conversion contract ina deploy-aa dow BSC. So a waylii, legacy tokenji maa ina nelaa to dead address (ina burn-aa haa abada) te a heɓa TigerOG e ratio 1:1. Ɗum ko laawol gootal — legacy tokenji ina bonnaa te mbaawaa heɓteede abada.

security.title: Security Model
security.content: Security ina feewnaa e kala layer Freedom Bridge:
security.point1: Conversion Architecture: Legacy tokens ina burn-aa haa abada via smart contracts verifyaaɗi e immutable.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Cross-chain messages ina verify-ee e Axelar's decentralized network.
security.point3: Consistent Supply: ITS ina manage minting e burning ngam maintainude constant total supply dow kala chains.
security.point4: Audited Logic: Feewnaa dow industry-standard Axelar e OpenZeppelin libraries.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Kala limoore supply ina waawi verify-eede independently on-chain:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Supply Breakdown
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply takkaaɗo daga original BNBTiger token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi to 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burn-aaɗi via original BNBTiger tax mechanism.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBTiger contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBTiger tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 86.18% e kala LP tokens
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 86.18% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
tigerogSupply.note: Tesko: TigerOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBTiger nder conversion. Circulating supply mo TigerOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBTiger caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBTiger token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Supply Breakdown
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply takkaaɗo daga original BNBLion token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi to 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burn-aaɗi via original BNBLion tax mechanism.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBLion contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBLion tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 99.98% e kala LP tokens
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 99.98% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
lionogSupply.note: Tesko: LionOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBLion nder conversion. Circulating supply mo LionOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBLion caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
lionogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBLion token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

frogogSupply.title: FrogOG Supply Breakdown
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG ina jogii fixed circulating supply takkaaɗo daga original BNBFrog token. Limoore ndee ina ƴeewa kala burned e permanently locked tokens.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens nelaaɗi to 0x000...dEaD ina burn-aa haa abada te mbaawaa heɓteede. Ɗum ina jeyaa heen tokens burn-aaɗi via original BNBFrog tax mechanism.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Limoore famarde e tokens ina stuck nder BNBFrog contract. Ɗii tokens mbaawaa heɓteede te ittiraama e circulation.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool ina jogii BNBFrog tokens paired e BNB. So LP tokens burn-aama (nelaa to dead address), underlying tokens nder pool ina lock-aa haa abada.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens burned: 99.31% e kala LP tokens
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ko ɗum waɗi, 99.31% e tokens nder LP ina locked haa abada
frogogSupply.note: Tesko: FrogOG ina jogii 1:1 ratio e BNBFrog nder conversion. Circulating supply mo FrogOG ina foti e true circulating supply mo BNBFrog caggal nde burned e locked tokens ittaa.
frogogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Ɗii limoore limiraa ko e launch. Legacy BNBFrog token ina jokki e burn-ude tokens e kala buy/sell transaction, so actual circulating supply ina waawi lesɗude seeɗa e ko hollaa.

header.title: Smart Contracts
header.subtitle: Adresiiji deployment laawɗuɗi ngam tokens e ponts nder ecosystem Freedom Bridge.

interchainTokens.title: Interchain Tokens
interchainTokens.description: Interchain tokens deploy-aaɗi via Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ɗii tokens ina jogii adresiiji potɗi dow kala rajooji tawaaɗi.

axelarNetwork.title: Axelar Network
axelarNetwork.description: Messaging protocol mo reeni cross-chain transfers te laaɓa data integrity hakkunde blockchains ceertuɗi.

conversionContracts.title: Conversion Contracts
conversionContracts.description: Ina waylu legacy tokens fayde interchain assets. Ɗii contracts ina tabitina deposit e minting logic dow origin chain.

conversionContractsTable.title: Adresiiji Conversion Contract
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Ɗii contracts dow BSC ina tabitina waylude daga legacy tokens fayde interchain tokens.

faq.title: Wallitorde Freedom Bridge
faq.subtitle: Jaabawuuji e naamne keewɗe faati e TigerOG, pontude, e Axelar.

cta.title: Aɗa jogii naamne goɗɗe?
cta.description: Naatu e community amen dow Telegram walla ƴeew Wiki ngam guides technical.

questions.q1: Ko woni faayiida waylude tokens am?
questions.a1: Waylude tokens maa fayde TigerOG ina momta transaction tax (ko ɓuri 10-12%) jokkondirɗo e legacy token. Ina newna maa kadi pontude ɗii tokens fayde blockchains goɗɗi hono Ethereum, Base, e ko nanndi heen via Axelar, ina newna access e ecosystems kese.
questions.q2: Mbele ina laaɓi huutoraade Freedom Bridge?
questions.a2: Eey. Protocol o ina huutoroo secure Conversion contract e Axelar's Interchain Token Service. So a waylii, BNBTiger maa ina burn-aa haa abada te a heɓa TigerOG e ratio 1:1. Burn mechanism o ina laaɓa wonde total supply ina manage-aa no haanirta dow kala chains.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge e hoore mum ƴettataa njoɓdi ngam waylude. A yoɓata tan ko standard blockchain gas fees. Pontude hakkunde chains ina adda cross-chain gas fee yoɓeteeɗo Axelar ngam cover relaying costs.
questions.q4: Ko waɗata so mi lalkii tokens am?
questions.a4: TigerOG tokens ina gollira hono kala ERC20 token goɗɗo. So a lalkii access e wallet maa, mbaawaa heɓteede. Kala sahaa reenu private keys maa e recovery phrases.
questions.q5: Mbele mi waawi artirde TigerOG tokens am fayde BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Alaa. Conversion ko laawol gootal. So a waylii BNBTiger fayde TigerOG, BNBTiger tokens maa ina burn-aa haa abada (nelaa to dead address). Ɗum feewnaa nii — TigerOG ko upgraded, tax-free version mo foti lomtaade legacy token o fof.
questions.a6: Min mballitotoo multiple EVM chains via Axelar, ina jeyaa heen BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, e ko nanndi heen. Ƴeew Wiki ngam list cakkitiɗo rajooji tawaaɗi.
questions.a7: Pontude yaawde ina pawaa e source chain's finality e Axelar's relaying. Ko ɓuri heewde, transfer hakkunde chains ina ƴetta 2-5 minti.
questions.q8: Ko woni circulating supplies e OG tokens?
questions.a8: Kala OG token ina jogii fixed circulating supply takkaaɗo daga original BNB token, nder ƴeewde burned tokens, stuck contract balances, e locked LP. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% e original). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% e original). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% e original). Ƴeew Wiki ngam breakdowns cakkitiɗe e kala token.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Waylude rajo waɗaani. Tiiɗno waylu e wallet maa.
